guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the way to go if you have straight tailwind or just a little bit of sidewind. Bounce it before the bunker and over to the fairway. From there you will find yourself with a long or short iron and a good chance for an eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 362 692 L 332 336" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 332 336 L 435 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="362" cy="692" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="332" cy="336" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="435" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 391 715 L 332 336" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 332 336 L 435 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="391" cy="715" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="332" cy="336" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="435" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 424 737 L 332 336" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 332 336 L 435 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="424" cy="737" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="332" cy="336" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="435" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: You can play your drive straight on this path but if you have curl on your driver, use it. Go with max curl and sidespin right. Be sure to stay away from the bunker in front. From the fairway, you'll be left with a wood into the green. Use your Sniper!

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 362 692 C 245 515 245 515 218 310" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 218 310 L 415 143" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="362" cy="692" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="218" cy="310" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="415" cy="143" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 391 715 C 245 515 245 515 218 310" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 218 310 L 415 143" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="391" cy="715" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="218" cy="310" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="415" cy="143" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

  <circle cx="440" cy="120" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 150 120 L 440 120" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/GokashoBay/annotations/1-Green.png" x="50" y="20" width="200" height="200" />
</g>

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is the way to go if you have a straight and strong tailwind. With a Big Dawg or Cataclysm you'll be able to get over the water to the green. Since you won't have that much backspin on those clubs, aim in the rough/bunker before the fairway starts. Use a good amount of topspin to get it to the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 185 880 L 180 400" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 180 400 L 200 135" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="185" cy="880" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="180" cy="400" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="200" cy="135" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 183 931 L 180 400" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 180 400 L 200 135" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="183" cy="931" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="180" cy="400" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="200" cy="135" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 182 983 L 180 400" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 180 400 L 200 135" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="182" cy="983" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="180" cy="400" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="200" cy="135" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Without tailwind this is the way you'll need to play the hole. Put yourself in the fairway as close to the rough as possible and do the same for your second shot. For your third shot, you'll have a short iron to the pin. Use a maximum of 1 bar in backspin as the green is uphill and will make the ball stop faster than you may think.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 185 880 L 170 400" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 170 400 L 170 190" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 170 190 L 200 110" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="185" cy="880" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="170" cy="400" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="170" cy="190" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="200" cy="110" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Tour 10 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 9 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Strong Wind Pointed at 8 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Strong Tailwind Pointed at 11 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Strong Left to Right Wind
Tour 8 Shootout - Left to Right Wind

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a fun Par 3 where you really need backspin. Aim between the bunkers with 4 bars of backspin with a long iron or almost max backspin with the Guardian. This is absolutely a big chance to make a hole in one, so be sharp with your adjustment. It's a downhill teeshot so your ball will be affected more by the wind.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 256 539 L 270 250" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="256" cy="539" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="250" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: There's really only one way to play this hole. Drive your ball up but NOT with max topspin. From there you can choose to bounce before the rough or go directly over the rough with your wood. Sniper and Guardian should give you the most success into the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 234 822 C 325 555 325 555 320 350" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 320 350 L 160 190" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="234" cy="822" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="320" cy="350" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="160" cy="190" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Tour 8 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 7 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Headwind Pointed at 7 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Left to Right Wind

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: It's a little tough to tell in the pictures, but you NEED to stay away from the left side of this green. Use a wood with a good ball guide and aim to the side of the bunker. The fairway is sloped in a way so the ball will bounce straight towards the pin. This is the preferred approach when faced with sidewind or headwind.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 285 582 L 220 280" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="285" cy="582" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="220" cy="280" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 282 642 L 220 280" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="282" cy="642" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="220" cy="280" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 254 700 L 220 280" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="254" cy="700" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="220" cy="280" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind go with this shot. Using the Guardian, or maxxed out Sniper, use maximum backspin and aim straight at the hole. It's slightly uphill before the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 285 582 L 246 248" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="285" cy="582" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="246" cy="248" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 282 642 L 246 248" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="282" cy="642" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="246" cy="248" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

resources.title: Tour 8 - Layup Technique with Hard Wind

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the common way to play the hole. Use sidespin and a small amount of curl (depending on the wind) to bounce over the rough and into the fairway. From there, aim for the rough just in front of the green. With a wood, use 0.5 in backspin and with a long iron use 2 in topspin. This will give you the best chance at an albatross. And of course, stay AWAY from the water!

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 253 800 L 206 431" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 206 431 L 152 266" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 152 266 L 212 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="253" cy="800" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="206" cy="431" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="266" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="212" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 260 852 L 206 431" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 206 431 L 152 266" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 152 266 L 212 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="260" cy="852" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="206" cy="431" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="266" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="212" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 268 909 L 206 431" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 206 431 L 152 266" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 152 266 L 212 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="268" cy="909" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="206" cy="431" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="266" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="212" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With difficult wind, bounce before the rough on the left and land just before the bunker. From there, it's easier to bounce off the small island fairway and onto the green. Use between 1 and 2 in topspin for the second shot and use the back of the green to let the ball fall down towards the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 253 800 L 147 488" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 147 488 L 119 373" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 119 373 L 191 116" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="253" cy="800" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="147" cy="488" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="119" cy="373" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="191" cy="116" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 260 852 L 147 488" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 147 488 L 119 373" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 119 373 L 191 116" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="260" cy="852" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="147" cy="488" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="119" cy="373" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="191" cy="116" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Tour 10 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 9 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Right to Left Wind
Tour 8 Shootout - Left to Right Wind

guides.name: Yellow Path
guides.text: On this path there's a small flat surface that you can aim at with sidespin and a few bars of backspin. That will give a single bounce down to the green. It's very important to be accurate if you choose this way so you don't bounce into the left bunker.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 187 558 L 180 236" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="187" cy="558" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="180" cy="236" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 186 636 L 180 236" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="636" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="180" cy="236" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 183 717 L 180 236" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="717" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="180" cy="236" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the easiest way to hit a flat surface, BUT also the easiest way to hit the rough or a bunker. Two bounces will land you near the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 187 558 L 188 299" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="187" cy="558" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="188" cy="299" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 186 636 L 188 299" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="636" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="188" cy="299" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 183 717 L 188 299" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="717" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="188" cy="299" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: The preferred approach is to use max backspin, landing in the bowl between the two front bunkers. Using 2 bars of sidespin should get you close to the hole.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 187 558 L 211 223" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="187" cy="558" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="211" cy="223" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 186 636 L 211 223" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="636" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="211" cy="223" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 183 717 L 211 223" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="717" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="211" cy="223" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="199" cy="298" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 328 422 L 199 298" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/GokashoBay/annotations/7-Green.png" x="228" y="322" width="200" height="200" />
</g>

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is the easiest and safest way to play the hole. Use backspin on your drive and put your ball just short of the rough on the right. From there, you'll have a wood into the green. Be sure to stay in the fairway because if you miss you won't be able to reach the green in two.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 167 801 L 322 407" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 322 407 L 203 122" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="167" cy="801" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="322" cy="407" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="122" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 144 849 L 322 407" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 322 407 L 203 122" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="144" cy="849" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="322" cy="407" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="122" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 896 L 322 407" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 322 407 L 203 122" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="896" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="322" cy="407" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="122" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: If you get straight tailwind, this is the way to go. Not recommended otherwise. Bounce just after the water with max topspin and put yourself into the rough. If you're lucky you may be able to get it out to the fairway. That will leave you with a short iron into the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 167 801 L 194 404" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 194 404 L 210 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 210 259 L 191 122" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="167" cy="801" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="194" cy="404" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="191" cy="122" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 144 849 L 194 404" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 194 404 L 210 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 210 259 L 191 122" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="144" cy="849" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="194" cy="404" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="191" cy="122" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 896 L 194 404" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 194 404 L 210 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 210 259 L 191 122" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="118" cy="896" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="194" cy="404" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="191" cy="122" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="188" cy="203" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 75 285 L 188 203" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/GokashoBay/annotations/8-Green.png" x="0" y="210" width="150" height="150" />
</g>

resources.title: Tour 8 - Strategy and Tips with Headwind

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: From the first tee you can go easy and just focus on landing in the fairway or go for maximum distance. The fairway is pretty wide and you'll be able to reach the green from the rough with a long drive.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 414 814 L 274 309" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 274 309 L 135 132" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="414" cy="814" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="274" cy="309" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="135" cy="132" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind pull out a Titan or Berserker with max topspin, sidespin and curl. Go all in and get as far as possible which should land you close to the green. If you get headwind or sidewind, use half curl and sidespin left to leave yourself with a long or short iron to the pin.

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 191 811 C 280 506 280 506 231 283" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 231 283 L 135 132" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="191" cy="811" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="231" cy="283" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="135" cy="132" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />
